casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Marvin TRENT. No. 520A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 30, 2004. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Joel H. Brewer, District Attorney, for State of NC. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender, for Trent.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of November 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (John Marvin Trent) shall have up to and including the 3rd day of January 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of November 2004."
